caption.title: Flow chart for mycobacterial isolates detection and characterization.
caption.p: A flow chart illustrating the steps taken to identify and characterize mycobacterial isolates. ZN: Ziehl Neelsen Stain AFB: Acid Fast Bacilli SD-Bioline: Standard Diagnostic Bioline LJ: Lowenstein Johnson MTBC: Mycobacterium Tuberculosis Complex CM: Common Mycobacteria AS: Additional Species.
